projects.name: Cinema for Students Among Writer's Strike
Being Brigitte: Advocacy & Artistry
projects.description: Meet Brigitte Bandit, an Austin, TX AFAB (assigned female at birth) drag queen, and her impact in the Texas drag scene and beyond. Special thanks to venues Oil Can Harry's and Rain on 4th for allowing me to film.

projects.name: Fashion Focus: How These Students are Redefining Style on UT's Campus
projects.description: Meet Fashion Focus, a student-led fashion collective thatâ€™s building community through style. From creative workshops and curated runway events to stunning photoshoots, this group celebrates individuality and self-expression through fashion.
